Change Disable Style Method

Short Name: Change Disable Style

Requires: VI Scripting

Class: DisableStructure Methods

To Use: Create a method.

Changes the disable structure to a Diagram Disable structure, a Conditional Disable structure, or a Type Specialization structure.

Parameters

Data typeNameRequiredDescription
Disable StyleYesDisable Style—Specifies the type of structure to which you want to convert.

0Conditional Disable Style—Changes a Diagram Disable structure or a Type Specialization structure to a Conditional Disable structure.
1Diagram Disable Style—Changes a Conditional Disable structure or a Type Specialization structure to a Diagram Disable structure.
2Type Specialization Style—Changes a Conditional Disable structure or a Diagram Disable structure to a Type Specialization structure.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this method.

Data typeNo return value
Available in Run-Time EngineYes (Read/Write)
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemNo
Settable when the VI is runningNo
Loads the front panel into memoryYes
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryYes
Remote access allowedYes
